text: Yes, Yes, Women Are My Weakness () is a 1929 German silent comedy film directed by Edmund Heuberger and starring Georgia Lind, , and Hans Albers. The film's sets were designed by Gustav A. Knauer and Willy Schiller. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1929 comedy films Category:German comedy films Category:1929 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Edmund Heuberger Category:German black-and-white films
title: Yes, Yes, Women Are My Weakness
